job_tasks.phrase: Work with our Microsoft tech stack including .NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#), SQL Server, on platforms like Azure and AWS.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes traditional software development tasks using specific technologies and platforms, fitting the definition of building and maintaining software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Software Engineer, enjoy additional benefits including:
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly identifies the role as a 'Software Engineer', indicating a focus on software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of discussing technical roles and projects, which is part of the broader software development lifecycle and team interaction.

job_tasks.phrase: If mutual interest is established, you'll undertake a coding challenge followed by a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to a coding challenge and interviews, which are standard parts of the software engineering hiring process and relate to assessing development capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: The selection process concludes within two weeks and, if successful, you'll receive an offer to join us at Exact.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the final stages of the hiring process for a technical role, aligning with the general context of software engineering employment.

job_tasks.phrase: At Exact, big code leads to greater opportunities, and we're excited to see where this journey will take you.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly references 'code' and its relation to career opportunities, reinforcing the software development nature of the role.

job_tasks.phrase: Exact develops cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants. The products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions for wholesale distribution, manufacturing, projects and construction. This saves time and provides insight. It enables customers to work efficiently, make informed decisions and continue growing.
job_tasks.justification: This section describes the business context and the purpose of the software being developed, indicating an understanding of how technology serves business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: We invest in your growth through various training opportunities and events such as Tech Talks, global hackathons, and tech summits.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the company's commitment to employee development and learning new technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates communication and discussion between different roles within the company, suggesting collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: If mutual interest is established, you'll undertake a coding challenge followed by a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues.
soft_skills.justification: This involves discussing feedback with managers and colleagues, which is a form of collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes personalized learning and acquiring new certifications, aligning with adaptability and continuous learning.

soft_skills.phrase: At Exact, big code leads to greater opportunities, and we're excited to see where this journey will take you.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase implies growth and opportunity tied to 'code', suggesting a forward-looking and potentially innovative environment where engineers can take ownership of their career path.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software development tasks using a Microsoft tech stack (.NET, C#, SQL Server) and cloud platforms (Azure, AWS). There is no mention of AI, ML, LLMs, or related specialized tasks. The role is clearly defined as a 'Software Engineer' with a strong emphasis on core software engineering principles and technologies.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the technologies and responsibilities involved. It explicitly states 'Software Engineer' and details a traditional software development tech stack, with no indication of AI/ML involvement. This makes the classification unambiguous.
